name: Light of Ruin
description: You draw forth a powerful natural essence, concentrating it into a beam of light 80ft long and 5 feet wide. Any creature caught in the blast must make DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking 2d12 + MOVE fairy damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The user takes typeless recoil damage equal to half the damage roll.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: A very appealing move, but after using this move, the user is more easily startled.
